channel.title: CVE Feed for G.U. CO., LTD. -- GU App for Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for G.U. CO., LTD. -- GU App for Android

item.title: CVE-2021-20777|2024-08-03T17:53:22.082Z -- g.u.%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- gu%20app%20for%20android
item.description: Improper authorization in handler for custom URL scheme vulnerability in GU App for Android versions from 4.8.0 to 5.0.2 allows a remote attacker to lead a user to access an arbitrary website via the vulnerable App.
